price: 一体、あなた方が（火種とする）その木を創ったのか？それとも、われら*が（その）創造者なのか？
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anshatum shajaratahā am naḥnu al-munshiūna
